title: interactive floor projection development
abstractText: The floor projection shown at celebration demonstrated how individual virtual characters can be created to interact with each other so that a viewer is able to detect predictable group behavior patterns(called emergent behaviour) . It then showed how people could enter this world ,be detected and become part of the interaction. Our intention now is to take this work to wider audiences both to demonstrate it and to record the interactions to see how far these are age related. Our target audiences are primary school children, secondary school children and university students/young professionals
